author: Special Correspondent
text:
A flying squad attached to Perambalur Assembly constituency seized liquor bottles from a vehicle while checking vehicles in the district on Tuesday.

During a vehicle check on on Yesanai-Melapuliyur Road, the team stopped a vehicle. The officials found 288 liquor bottles inside the vehicle being transported without any documents.

The consignment along with the vehicle was seized and handed over to the office of the Revenue Divisional Officer.
title: 288 liquor bottles seized
